content: * *Billy Goh Piak Chiang** served as the Assistant Chief Commissioner, Executive Director and International Commissioner of the [Singapore Scout Association](/wiki/Singapore_Scout_Association). In 1997, Goh was awarded the 257th *[Bronze Wolf](/wiki/Bronze_Wolf)*, the only distinction of the [World Organization of the Scout Movement](/wiki/World_Organization_of_the_Scout_Movement), awarded by the World Scout Committee for exceptional services to world Scouting. - Scouting portal This [Scouting or Guiding](/wiki/Scouting) article about a person is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This article about a politician from Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Billy Goh
